item.title: 24 Hour clock
item.description: 24-hour analog dial Clock in Rescue Me, Season 4 Episode 8, “Solo” Now I want one! But @ basically $50 I think the Pegasus 6NN63 Clock, Quartz, Round is a little too pricey. Frankly there’s not really any point since we all use “military” time in this house anyway; it’s only purpose would be to remind the boys that there are many ways to visualize so common an object as a clock faceâ€¦ and maybe fsck with American visitors.
